item.description:
Google 101 & Google Adwords Marketing

Come learn how Google tools can help you reach more customers, understand what customers are searching for, and how you can operate more efficiently.

Online marketing best practices will be covered, including how to:

  • reach the right audience using Google AdWords and boost your ad performance by choosing the right keywords and writing compelling ads
  • claim your business on Google Maps and create a Google Place page
  • use Google Analytics to track online traffic and optimize your website

This interactive workshop is ideal for businesses new to online advertising as well as existing AdWords customers wanting to get more results from their online advertising investment.

Presented by Tricia White and Tammi Jacobsen of the MSBDC Network's Southeast Regional Office.

Please note: This seminar has a separate registration form. Also, you must pay with a credit card. No other forms of payment are accepted for this seminar.

Date: Friday, December 9, 2011
Time: 9:00 a.m. - noon
Location: Scibelli Enterprise Center, 1 Federal Street, Springfield (directions)
Cost: $30 - credit cards only
Contact: Western Regional Office at 413-737-6712 or msbdc@msbdc.umass.edu

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Google 101 & Google Adwords Marketing ($30)
